introduction: This marketing relationship plan is designed for wholesale and distribution businesses looking to strengthen retailer relationships and drive consistent ordering through strategic communication.

company_summary.name: Wholesale & Distribution Company
company_summary.activities: B2B wholesale distribution, including product sourcing, inventory management, and retailer supply
company_summary.target: Retail buyers, purchasing managers, and business owners who need reliable product supply for their stores

programs_list.kpi: Time to first reorder, Onboarding satisfaction, Account activation rate
programs_list.description: Comprehensive onboarding to help new retailers set up accounts and understand ordering processes.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Brevo's B2B automation enables structured onboarding sequences that ensure every new retailer receives consistent, helpful communication.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for detailed guides + SMS for quick tips and order confirmations
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Pre-built wholesale templates help you create professional onboarding in minutes.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Integration with your order management system enables smart reorder reminders based on each retailer's actual purchase patterns.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for catalog and pricing + SMS for urgent stock alerts
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Order history triggers enable fully automated, personalized reorder timing.

how_brevo_helps_you.why_brevo_is_better: Calendar-based automation and segmentation ensure timely seasonal communication that helps retailers prepare for peak demand.
how_brevo_helps_you.omnichannel_channels: Email for seasonal catalogs + SMS for deadline reminders
how_brevo_helps_you.setup_efficiency: Annual seasonal campaigns can be templated and scheduled to repeat automatically.

conclusion: Wholesale and distribution businesses that implement these relationship marketing programs can expect improved retailer retention, more consistent ordering patterns, and stronger partnerships that drive mutual growth.
